analysis.Summary: A Vue single-file component that renders a downward-pointing chevron arrow using inline SVG.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable navigation icon (chevron down) for use across the application’s UI.

Components.name: IconChevronBottom
Components.responsibility: Render an SVG chevron arrow rotated 90° to point downwards, with customizable fill color.

Usage: Import the component in a parent Vue component:
Register it in the components section and use in template:
Notes: No <style> section is defined — styling is controlled via the SVG and CSS custom properties.
The default fill prop is set to 'rgb(var(--black)' which appears to be missing a closing parenthesis.
The SVG is rotated by 90 degrees around its center (40,40) to transform a right-pointing chevron into a downward-pointing one.
No methods or computed properties are defined — component is purely presentational.
